item.title: Musk Says Twitter Advertisers Are Coming Back
item.description: Elon Musk Says Twitter Advertisers Are Coming Back Elon Musk said in an interview in Paris that he believes Twitter advertisers are coming back. Musk said that he wants to make Twitter a more attractive place for advertisers, and that he believes he can do this by making the platform more engaging and user-friendly.
